summary:
This mod adds new companions, Crea and Lese
The mesh and texture are included in each mod. Standalone working.
UNPB or CBBE body.
descriptionHtml:
Companion Crea and Lese
                            by Rugi

[Description]
New version of Crea is released.
Crea Ver 2.0b
level bug fix
Crea Ver 2.0a
Face and body are refined.
Overall, ability is adjusted.
All two-handed and heavy armor perks are added.
Block and Restoration perks are partially added. 
Some healing spells are added.

This mod adds companions, Crea and Lese.
The mesh and texture are included in each mod.
UNPB body and CBBE body are available. 

Crea
  Breton Warrior. Min level 4.
 Location 
  Bannered Mare, Whiterun
 Weapon and Aromor
  Two-handed greatsword, heavy armor
 Spell
  Closewounds, Fasthealing, Healing, HealingHands, HealOther 
 Perks
  Heavy Armor, Two-handed, Regeneration, and  LightFoot
 Default outfit
  Iron armer set and steel greatsword

Lese
  Breton Assassin. Min level 4.
 Location
  Vilemyr Inn, Ivarstead
 Weapon and Armor
  Dual blades, light armor
 Perks
  LightFoot, Unhinderd, DualFlurry1, Stealth4, Silence
 Default outfit
  Hide armor set and steel daggers

Armor and weapon in screenshot(not included in this mod)
 Sedethul by InBleedingRapture
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21991/
 RR Elphintos Set v1_1 by Reira
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29690/

 R18Pn 04 - Ritter Armor for UNP and CBBE V3 by NPR
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13638
 R18Pn 04 - Ritter Armor for UNP CBBEv3 - Black Retexture by Palmface
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15910
 Crainte Vomir by Hentai 
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11543
 Triss Armor Retextured by Psyke23 and oldholo
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4708

[Installation]

Extracting files in skyrim data folder and enable the esp.

[Uninstallation]
Crea
Delete these folders:
Data\\Companion_Crea.esp
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\Creabody
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\Companion_Crea.esp
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\CreaBody
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\Companion_Crea.esp
Lese
Delete these folders:
Data\\Companion_Lese.esp
Data\\Companion_Lese_ReadMe.txt
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\Lesebody
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\Companion_Lese.esp
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\LeseBody
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\Companion_Lese.esp

[Credit & Thanks to]

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - Now with Jiggle BBP by calyps - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899
RANs HeadMesh Variants by RAN46 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7127
univision Face by DD AKT - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569
